name: dmmptss
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

comment: The domain of a mapping is a subset of its base class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jun-2013.)
